title: Pixel4 XL - impossible to do the system update
content:
Hi,
With my Pixel 4 XL, I am trying to update the system, but it always failed.
So I try via the recovery mode, but I am getting the famous android mascot which says "NO COMMAND".
I manage to get out of it and do a factory reset.

I do not update anything, no sim card, no wifi, no downloaded app, but still, I am getting NO COMMAND in the recovery mode.

Cheers
